definition: the time/the right time/weather conditions/destiny/course of time/heaven's natural order
the time is right, geographical and social conditions are favorable (idiom); a good time to go to war
pinyin: tian1 shi2 di4 li4 ren2 he2

definition: going with nature and the seasons (TCM)

sentences.english: Idling for long periods in cold weather can actually cause excessive engine wear.
sentences.chinese: 冷天時的長時間怠速會造成發動機過分磨損。

sentences.english: These refer to the last days when the kingdom of God will be set up on earth.
sentences.chinese: 這些提及的最後幾天時，上帝的王國將成立地球上。

sentences.english: They told that Professor Liu would have been teaching here for twenty years by this winter.
sentences.chinese: 他們說到今年冬天時劉教授在這裏教書要滿二十年了。

sentences.english: Heaven and earth never agreed better to frame a place for man's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 天時地利，已造就最好的一個地方，給人居住。

sentences.english: Blood Moons now stop correctly if time is changed to day by the server.
sentences.chinese: 當服務器時間切換到白天時，血月會正確的停止。

sentences.english: On day 28, the sarcoma tumors under the skin were recovered from the mice and weighed.
sentences.chinese: 在第28天時，皮下腫瘤從老鼠身上取出並且稱重。

sentences.english: In the winter, perspiration permeated through all over his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 冬天時，他的汗從內裏透出外衣，汗漬斑斑。

sentences.english: Arms folded in rest, women look over Cairo as they chat.
sentences.chinese: 婦女們把雙臂搭在窗口上聊天時望向開羅。

sentences.english: While chatting, we found ourselves bopping to the music playing on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 聊天時，我們突然聽到收音機裏播放的音樂。

sentences.english: Where there is no tomorrow any more, yesterday is always there.
sentences.chinese: 到最後再沒有明天時，昨天也是永在的。

sentences.english: I stored all of my thick clothes during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏天時，我把所有的厚衣服都收了起來。

sentences.english: Why do we wear sweaters in cold weather?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們會於冷天時穿著毛線衫？

sentences.english: While we were chatting, he slipped into bed.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在聊天時，他溜上牀睡覺去了。

sentences.english: He smiled coldly at the angel.
When chatting on the internet, we should not give out our true names lightly.
sentences.chinese: 網上聊天時不要輕易把自己的真實名氏告訴別人。

definition: to comply/to conform to/in tune with/adapting to/to adjust to
rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
